prHeadline: Adaviv Raises $2.3M in Upsized and Oversubscribed Seed Round Led by Delta Emerald Ventures to Scale their AI-Driven Plant Intelligence Platform for Indoor Farming
headlineTxt: Jul 20, 2021, 08:49 ETAdaviv Raises $2.3M in Upsized and Oversubscribed Seed Round Led by Delta Emerald Ventures to Scale their AI-Driven Plant Intelligence Platform for Indoor Farmingintegration features.AdaViv's Lean Cultivation™ Platform and Crop-Care™ Software leverages proprietary software, machine vision and AI analytics to illuminate plant health and growth biometrics, enabling earlier detection, treatment efficacy tracking and lower costs of laborMore news about: Adaviv Inc.
